title: Promise
description: The novelization of the popular western film.The Civil War is nearing its end...but that doesn't mean the battle is over. As the south falls, wealth is stolen and hidden. This is the story of one such cache of gold and those who encountered it. A retired contract scout embarks on a deadly mission to discover the truth about his true love and a little girl. But when years go by and events unfold, he finds more than just a stolen confederate cashbox. He finds the peace to pursue his future.This novella is for the over 18 reader due to graphic violence, sexual vioilence, language and adult situations. 22 thoudand words approx 108 pages
author: Elle Marlow
